info.name: Common Popbill Taxinvoice API
info.description:
When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer authentication is stored in the variable of Collection Scope.


So, You must always call GetToken to test the API.

exec: * GetToken is a sample code that issues a Bearer token to be entered in
* the Authentication header when calling the POPBiLL API.
* (See the POPBILL API Certificate PDF Manual for more information)
// The LinkID and SecretKey are credentials and are changed to the values ​​provided by POPBiLL.
* The following code is that makes up the HMAC Message Digest
// access_id is the Seller Business Registration Number (10 digits number except hyphen('-'))
// and the Scope array is a list of service codes that can be used for the issued token.
var TokenRequest = stringify({access_id : Access_id, scope : Scopes});
// request header for API Server HMAC authentication.

request.description: Request Token for POPBiLL API.

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// The invoice ID is a unique value assigned by user to avoid duplicated issuance and organized e-Tax invoices systematically

request.description:
Check whether an invoice ID is in use or not.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#CheckMgtKeyInUse

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.

request.description:
Regist and Issue the e-Tax invoice making e-Signature. 

At the same time of issuance, points(fee) is charged and notification mail is sent to customer.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#RegistIssue

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ an unique value combined English letter, numeric and hyphen(-)
// BulkSubmit API can accept the issuance of 100 e-Tax invoice per submission
// Created 100 e-Tax invoice in a loop to help understand the BulkSubmit API.
// Title of notification mail sent to customer
// - Default: a title POPBiLL set in advance
// - Valid Value : 정과금 = Paid by seller
// Issuance Type - Valid Value : 정발행 = e-Tax invoice
// └ 과세 = Taxable, 영세 = Zero-rate, 면세 = Exempted
// [Seller] Invoice ID assigned by user (No redundancy)
// └ An unique value to combine English letter, number, hyphen('-')
// [Seller] Identification Number for minor place of business
// [Seller] Name of the person in charg
// [Seller] Telephone of the person in charge
// [Seller] Mobile of the person in charge
// [Seller] Email address of the person in charge
// [Seller] Whether you send a notification SMS or not to buyer's mobile(no. 48 invoiceeHP1) issuing an e-Tax invoice.
// └ Fee is charged to every SMS and is refunded if sending fails.
// └ 사업자 = company, 개인 = individual, 외국인 = foreigner
// └ It must be synchronized with {no. 36 invoiceeType}
// └ Company: Business registration number (10 digits except '-')
// └ Individual: Resident registration number (13 digits except '-')
// [Buyer] Identification Number for minor place of business
// [Buyer] Name of the person in charge
// [Buyer] Telephone of the person in charge
// [Buyer] Mobile of the person in charge
// [Buyer] Email address of the person in charge
// It's only requires to 'requested e-Tax invoice'
// └ Only positive(+)/negative(-) numbers and – (minus sign) are available
// └ Only positive(+)/negative(-) numbers and – (minus sign) are available
// └ Only positive(+)/negative(-) numbers and – (minus sign) are available
// 1 = Correction of errors, 2 = Change in supply values, 3 = Return,
// 4 = Cancellation of contract, 5 = Post opening of local letter of credit, 6 = Duplicated issuance
// └ 영수 = Amount paid, 청구 = Amount due
// One of e-Tax invoice's items to manage document – 'Serial number'
// └ Mandatory in case of {no 36. invoiceeType} is "외국인" (foreigner).
// └ Need to put 'Alien Registration Number' or 'Passport Number'.
// Whether you attach registered business license
// Whether you attach registered copy of bankbook
// └ Must write the number in a row starting from 1 (Maximum : 99)
// └ Below the decimal point is rounded off
// └ Below the decimal point is rounded off
// [List] To send notification mails to multiple person in charge (Maximum : 5)
// └ Must write the number in a row starting from 1 (Maximum : 5)
// Name of the person in charge
// └ Must write the number in a row starting from 1 (Maximum : 5)
// Name of the person in charge
// BulkSubmit API - POST Request Body object
//	Whether user permits to issue an overdued e-Tax invoice or not
// Generate a Message digest for Request Body message validation

request.description:
Submit the issuance of bulk invoices. A single request processes maximum 100 invoices at once


Duplicated submission ID and e-Tax invoice data are not accepted and it’s handled as returning registered submission ID, not the error code and message


https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#BulkSubmit

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// Assigned submitID for the bulk submit

request.description:
Check the submission status for bulk issuance using SubmitID.


The issuance result is returned when the submission status(variable: txState) is changed to '2'(successfully completed).


https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#GetBulkResult

request.description:
Cancel the issuance of e-Tax invoice in the state of 'ISSUED' before filing starts. 

It's impossible to cancel in other cases except 'ISSUED'.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#CancelIssue

request.description:
Check the status of bulk e-Tax invoices and detailed information. (Maximum : 1,000 invoices)

Check variable 'stateCode' of returned 'TaxinvoiceInfo' to confirm status of e-Tax invoice.

See the links below for more information on the returned objects

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#GetInfos

request.description:
ㆍGet a XML to check detailed information of a single e-Tax invoice.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#GetXML

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
// └ R = Date of registration, W = of trading, I = of issuance
// Initial date of search scope (Format : yyyyMMdd)
// Last date of search scope (Format : yyyyMMdd)
// └ Wild card(*) can be put on 2nd, 3rd letter – e.g. "3**", "6**"
// └ Valid Value : N / M (multiple choice is possible)
// └ N = General, M = Revised e-Tax invoice
// └ Valid Value : T / N / Z (multiple choice is possible)
// └ T = Taxable, N = Exempted, Z = Zero-rate
// Whether e-Tax invoice is issued after the due or not
// └ '' = all, true = issued after the due, false = issued within the due
// Type of the Business Registration Number of minor place
// Business Registration Number of minor place
// └ one more numbers must be separated by comma(',') (e.g. 1234, 1110)
// Whether the business registration number of minor place is enrolled or not
// Name of Buyer Company / Business Registration Number (for company) / Residential Registration Number (for entrepreneur) / 9999999999999 (for foreigner)
// The number of list to be displayed per page (Maximum : 1,000)
// Whether e-Tax invoice is issued by API or not
// └ '' = all, 0 = issued in POPBiLL website, 1 = issued by API
// └ Valid Value : P / H (multiple choice is possible)
// └ P = registered in POPBiLL, H = registered(issued) in Hometax or another ASP
// └ 1 = In business, 2 = Closed, 3 = Suspended, 4 = Failed to check
// Invoice ID or NTS Confirm number

request.description:

request.description:

ㆍReturned URL is valid for 30 seconds and after the valid time, page is not opened.

request.description:
Resend a notification mail to customer. There's no minimum time required and no maximum number of calling API.

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#SendEmail

exec: * You must call GetToken Request before calling api.
* When you call GetToken Request, the token used for Bearer Token authentication is stored in the Collection Scope variable.
contents : 'test sms', // Contents of SMS, (*Exceeded contents are truncated automatically)

request.description:
ㆍSend a SMS(short message) to notify issuance of e-Tax invoice. To call this API, an additional cost is charged apart from the issuance cost.

ㆍUser can check the result of sending SMS on POPBiLL website [문자·팩스(Messaging/FAX) -> 문자(Messaging) -> 전송내역(Sending log)]

ㆍSMS's capacity is 90byte and exceeded contents are truncated automatically. (Maximum of Korean letters: 45)

https://docs.popbill.com/en/taxinvoice/java/api#SendSMS
